
#first 10 billing account results for a domain#

Transaction: registraraccountqry 
domain_name: test88888.net.nz 
max_results: 10 
skip_results: 0 


#billing account results searching on RegistrantRef#

Transaction: registraraccountqry 
Registrant_customer_ref: ref


#billing account results for a domain between a date range#

Transaction: RegistrarAccountQry 
domain_name: test88888.net.nz 
max_results: 1000 
skip_results: 0 
Trans_Date_From: 2007/1/28,12:00 
Trans_Date_To: 2007/9/28,12:00
